content.rendered:
1. Approve the Lottery
  2. Click Always win 1x to see that you will get your money back
  3. Play the lottery by clicking 25% chance for 2x
  4. Every bet is 10 BUSD
  5. Always watch the transaction cost. The normal transaction cost should be around 0.000429 BNB ~ 0.50$. In some cases when you don’t have enough BUSD the transaction cost may be way higher
